title: Video: Foals – My Number
body:
I’m not really too sure what’s going on in this new **Foals** video.

Part anti-drug campaign, part critique of modern society, it’s not too far from the episode of Skins that they appeared in all those years ago (remember that?!). Beginning amidst a normal, semi-pretentious gig environment, it quickly descends into three minutes of hallucinations, trippy visuals and some rather bizarre dancing. Check it out below, and five points if you can spot the members of [Blaenavon](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/19145-new-blaenavon-into-the-night-denim-patches/) showing their ugly faces.
